SELECT DISTINCT(c.cashId),tradeCode,c.userId,machineNo,c.type type,m.name cashName,c.menberNo memberName,payType, round(c.totalMoney/100,2) totalMoney,round(c.money/100,2) money,c.number,c.addTime FROM m_cashFlow c LEFT JOIN t_cashier m ON c.cashierId=m.cashierId LEFT JOIN m_cashDetail d ON d.cashId=c.cashId LEFT JOIN m_commodity com ON d.commodityId=com.commodityId WHERE c.storeId=#{relationMap.storeId} AND c.status=1
AND ( com.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or com.commodityCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or com.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
order by c.addTime desc

SELECT DISTINCT(c.cashId),tradeCode,c.userId,machineNo,c.type type,m.name cashName,c.menberNo memberName,payType, round(c.totalMoney/100,2) totalMoney,round(c.money/100,2) money,c.number,c.addTime FROM m_cashFlow c LEFT JOIN t_cashier m ON c.cashierId=m.cashierId LEFT JOIN m_cashDetail d ON d.cashId=c.cashId LEFT JOIN m_commodity com ON d.commodityId=com.commodityId WHERE c.storeId=#{storeId} AND c.status=1
AND ( com.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{commodityNo}),'%') or com.commodityCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{commodityNo}),'%') or com.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{commodityNo}),'%') )
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(c.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
order by c.addTime desc

SELECT d.commodityId,d.commodityName,round(d.totalVipPrice/100,2) totalVipPrice, d.number number,round(d.totalPrice/100,2) totalPrice,unitName FROM m_cashFlow c LEFT JOIN m_cashDetail d ON d.cashId=c.cashId where c.`cashId`=#{0}
SELECT cashId,tradeCode,round(money/100,2) money FROM m_cashFlow WHERE cashId=#{0}

SELECT f.cashierId cashierId,m.name cashName,m.addTime, SUM(IF(payType=0,money/100,0)) xianjin, SUM(IF(payType=1,money/100,0)) zhifubao, SUM(IF(payType=2,money/100,0)) weixin, SUM(IF(payType=3,money/100,0)) yinlian, SUM(IF(payType=4,money/100,0)) baitiao FROM m_cashFlow f LEFT JOIN t_cashier m ON f.cashierId=m.cashierId WHERE f.storeId=#{relationMap.storeId} AND f.status=1 and f.type = '1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND m.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.cashName}),'%')
GROUP BY f.cashierId,m.addTime ORDER BY m.addTime DESC

SELECT c.commodityCode commodityCode,d.commodityName commodityName,c.commodityNo commodityNo, d.addTime `addTime`,d.unitName unitName, round(d.number,2) number,round(d.totalVipPrice/100,2) totalVipPrice, round(d.inPrice/100*d.number,2) inPrice FROM m_cashDetail d LEFT JOIN m_cashFlow f ON d.cashId=f.cashId LEFT JOIN m_commodity c ON d.commodityId=c.commodityId WHERE f.storeId=#{relationMap.storeId} AND f.status=1 and f.type = '1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(d.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(d.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( d.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or c.commodityCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or c.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') )
ORDER BY d.addTime DESC

SELECT c.commodityCode commodityCode,c.commodityNo commodityNo,a.commodityId,a.commodityName, ROUND(a.totalVipPrice,2) totalVipPrice,ROUND(a.inPrice,2) inPrice,ROUND(a.lirun,2) lirun, ROUND(a.number,2) number,a.unitName FROM ( SELECT d.unitName unitName,d.commodityId commodityId,d.commodityName commodityName, SUM(number) number, SUM(d.totalVipPrice / 100) totalVipPrice, SUM(d.inPrice / 100 * d.number) inPrice, SUM(d.totalVipPrice / 100) - SUM(d.inPrice / 100 * d.number) lirun FROM m_cashDetail d WHERE cashId IN ( SELECT cashId FROM m_cashFlow WHERE storeId = #{relationMap.storeId} AND status = 1 AND `type` = '1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
) GROUP BY commodityName,commodityId,unitName ) AS a LEFT JOIN m_commodity c ON a.commodityId = c.commodityId where 1=1
AND ( a.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or c.commodityCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or c.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') )
ORDER BY a.totalVipPrice DESC

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(money)/100,0) money FROM m_cashFlow f LEFT JOIN m_cashDetail d ON f.cashId=d.cashId LEFT JOIN m_commodity c ON d.commodityId=c.commodityId WHERE f.storeId = #{relationMap.storeId} AND f.`status` = 1 AND f.`type` = '1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{relationMap.endTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND ( c.commodityName LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or c.commodityCode LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') or c.commodityNo LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{relationMap.commodityNo}),'%') )

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(money),0),2) money,SUM(number) number,cashId,ROUND(SUM(lirun),2) lirun, ROUND(SUM(lirun)/SUM(money),2) maolilv FROM (SELECT IFNULL((f.money/100),0) money, f.number, DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime, '%Y-%m-%d') cashId, IFNULL(SUM(d.totalVipPrice/100) - SUM(d.inPrice/100 * d.number),0) lirun FROM m_cashFlow f LEFT JOIN m_cashDetail d ON d.cashId = f.cashId WHERE DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 6 DAY) <= DATE(f.addTime) AND f.storeId = #{0} AND f.`status` = 1 and f.type='1' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime, '%Y-%m-%d'),f.number,f.money,f.cashId ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime, '%Y-%m-%d')) AS a GROUP BY cashId

select a.categoryName categoryName,sum(totalVipPrice) totalVipPrice from (select categoryId,categoryName from m_category where storeId=#{storeId} AND status = 1 AND parentId="0") a left join m_category c on a.categoryId=c.parentId left join m_commodity co on co.categoryId=c.categoryId left join (SELECT t.* FROM m_cashDetail t LEFT JOIN m_cashFlow f ON t.cashId=f.cashId WHERE 1=1 AND f.type='1'
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(f.addTime,'%Y%m%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y%m%d')
) d on d.commodityId=co.commodityId group by a.categoryName

SELECT CASE WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 8 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <9 THEN '08:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 9 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <10 THEN '09:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 10 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <11 THEN '10:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 11 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <12 THEN '11:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 12 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <13 THEN '12:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 13 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <14 THEN '13:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 14 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <15 THEN '14:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 15 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <16 THEN '15:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 16 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <17 THEN '16:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 17 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <18 THEN '17:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 18 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <19 THEN '18:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 19 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <20 THEN '19:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 20 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <21 THEN '20:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 21 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <22 THEN '21:00' WHEN HOUR(`addTime`) >= 22 AND HOUR(`addTime`) <23 THEN '23:00' ELSE '00:00' END hour,count(*) number FROM m_cashFlow WHERE storeId=#{storeId} AND `status`=1 and type='1' and DATE_FORMAT(`addTime`,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour
